name: Brakence
description: '''Randall Todd "Randy" Findell''' (born December 17, 2001), known professionally as '''Brakence''' (stylized in [[all lowercase]]), is an American [[singer-songwriter]], rapper, [[Record producer#Digital production|record producer]] and musician from [[Columbus, Ohio]] who is currently signed to [[Columbia Records]] and [[Sony Music]]. He is known for his [[hyperpop]]-influenced style which has been described as a mixture of [[Midwest emo]] and [[emo rap]], and his use of both [[baritone]] and [[falsetto]] vocals.
